titles.title: Fort Frederica National Monument Boundary Expansion Act
Fort Frederica National Monument Boundary Expansion Act
A bill to expand the boundary of Fort Frederica National Monument in the State of Georgia, and for other purposes.
Fort Frederica National Monument Boundary Expansion Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Fort Frederica National Monument Boundary Expansion Act
This bill expands the boundary of the Fort Frederica National Monument on St. Simons Island, Georgia, and increases the maximum number of acres that may be included in the monument from 250 to 305 acres.
